room_title: Escape room "Piece Meal" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: I had so much fun here! The thrill is amazing! It was my first time to an escape room but it was great! The owner and his staff are amazing people who genuinely connected with us to get feed back! You should check this place out! While you wait, they have ping pong and a basketball hoop! But that's all I can really say! Thank you, guys!

room_title: Escape room "Piece Meal" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: I was scared. So scared. These guys KILLED IT! If you like suspense, you need to go! So much fun and the owners are amazing and sweet people.

room_title: Escape room "Piece Meal" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: We had so much fun. Friendly staff and fair pricing. We went through the scary room piece meal and it was so creepy and fun. The clues were tough but not so hard that they frustrated you. Will definitely come back to try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Piece Meal" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: I had a great time in the Piece Meal room! Iâ€™ve been to other escape rooms but this one tops them all. The set design and props were amazing and the staff very friendly. It was challenging and fun.

room_title: Escape room "Piece Meal" by Alternate Reality Escape Rooms in Houston
review: We had so much fun! We laughed, screamed and felt so dumb hahaha. It was the most fun I've had in a long time. The staff was amazing, witty and charming. Our group was 4 girls, all very intelligent however we've decided next time we need to bring some smarter people! The props were fun and scary. The set was interactive and challenging. Great job we will be coming back.
